comprehensive_overview: Cython is a programming language that makes it easy to write C extensions for Python. It provides a superset of the Python language that allows for calling C functions and declaring C types on variables and class attributes.
core_features: Cython allows for easy integration of C libraries and functions with Python code, enabling developers to speed up Python code by writing performance-critical portions in C. It also provides static type declarations that can lead to performance improvements over pure Python code.
